author: rjmholt
body:
From https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShellEditorServices/issues/618.

There is an ask for a "just my code" functionality in the PowerShell debugger, so that debugging a script inside a Pester test, you don't have to step through, say, It.ps1 or Should.ps1.

Does anything like this exist in PowerShell currently?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: /cc @KirkMunro It seems you have an issue for this.

comments.author: KirkMunro
comments.body:
Thanks @iSazonov.

@rjmholt: See #10530 for my developing thoughts on JMC (just my code).

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as duplicate and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Enable whitelisting for debugging
